short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save cases to your bklg.org docket.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: bklg Case Saver is a tool for immigrants and immigration lawyers to get insight into their cases before EOIR. It allows users to check if their asylum clock is running and save their case to their bklg.org account. bklg Case Saver empowers users to determine their eligibility to apply for employment authorization and resolve asylum clock issues with the court. Using the save feature, users can gain further insight into their case by adding their case to their bklg.org docket.
